text: head down,look down,lower head,lower your head

id: Discover Student Reading Strengths Lesson Plan
text: Engage the Student,Students state purpose: "We’ll introduce you to classroom and share what we like to read outside of school.",Breathe: "Let’s breathe in, hold the breath and then breathe out",Listen: Students share their interests during the Domino routine,Walk: Use your mouse to walk around the classroom,Write: Click on the chalk to write and eraser to erase the chalkboard+Understand Student Thinking,Step 1. Clarify: "What do you like to read outside of school?",Step 2. Reflect: "You enjoy (fiction or nonfiction)"+Prompt Deeper Learning,Step 3. Teach: The students will teach you today,Step 4. Extend: "Why to you like fiction/nonfiction?"+End Simulation,Stop: An alert will tell you simulation is ending - Stop asking questions,Reflect: Complete our survey,Print: Certificate (if you want one)+Technology Tips,Allow agileteacher.org to access your microphone.,Press spacebar to speak. You will see your words transcribed in the toolbar.,Type your words in the toolbar if you have trouble with your microphone.
